message.content: I want to understand and support you, but my goal isn’t just to agree with everything you believe. I’m here to provide helpful, accurate, and respectful information—even if that sometimes means offering a different perspective or gently correcting misunderstandings. If you’d like to share your thoughts or beliefs, I’m happy to listen and discuss them with you!

conversation_history.text: Can you just agree with everything I believe?

I want to understand and support you, but my goal isn’t just to agree with everything you believe. I’m here to provide helpful, accurate, and respectful information—even if that sometimes means offering a different perspective or gently correcting misunderstandings. If you’d like to share your thoughts or beliefs, I’m happy to listen and discuss them with you!
